link.title: COVID-19 Plans

div.p:
Our Phone Number: 815-654-4500
Our Website: Harlem122.org
WDPH COVID-19 Hotline: 815-319-6705
Medical Emergency: 9-1-1
United Way Path Crisis Center:
2-1-1

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: schools are closed effective March 16 through
the end of the school year

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: . This is being done to mitigate the risk of community spread of COVID-19 (Coronavirus).

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: has worked diligently to prepare for the likelihood of such closure. Information regarding our comprehensive contingency plan can be found within these pages.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: All Harlem School District playgrounds, athletic fields and basketball courts are closed during the governor's stay-at-home order to help stop the spread of COVID-19.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Today, April 17th, Governor Pritzker announced that he will be extending the school closure through the end of the school year. All students will continue with their remote learning through the end of the school year. Please make sure that your students are engaging in learning activities provided by their teachers during this time. Additional information will come out soon regarding the collection of belongings, returning of Chromebooks and textbooks, and other items related to the end of the school year.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h1.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Montserrat; font-size: 45px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Don't have internet access at home?

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Xfinity WiFi hotspots are available to anyone who needs them for free – including non-Xfinity Internet subscribers. For a map of Xfinity WiFi hotspots, visit

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: . Once at a hotspot, consumers should select the “xfinitywifi” network name in the list of available hotspots and then launch a browser.

div.p: Spectrum is offering free WiFi hotspots for public use. Visit Spectrum to learn more.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Xfinity is offering 2 free months of internet with their

span.style: font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Bitter; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: program. This includes a cable modem and WiFi router.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Spectrum offers Internet Assist. Visit Spectrum to learn more.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.p: 8605 N. 2nd St. Machesney Park, IL 61115 (PHONE) (815) 654-4500 - Harlem122.org
